languages.text: "В последнем путешествии мне запомнился сенешаль Версериан — он несколько раз заходил справиться о моем здоровье. Добрый человек, верный слуга {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Кажется, он одинаково дотошно относится к инспекции систем логистики и проверке здоровья случайно оказавшихся на корабле {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g}!"

"During the last journey, Seneschal Werserian stood out for me — he came by several times to ask about my health. He's an honourable man and a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I think he is as meticulous in his inspections of the logistics systems as he is in his enquiries about the health of the occasional {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} aboard the ship!"
languages.original_text: "В последнем путешествии мне запомнился сенешаль Версериан — он несколько раз заходил справиться о моем здоровье. Добрый человек, верный слуга {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Кажется, он одинаково дотошно относится к инспекции систем логистики и проверке здоровья случайно оказавшихся на корабле {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "In the last journey, Seneschal Werserian stood out for me — he came by several times to ask about my health. He's a kind man and a loyal servant of the Imperium. I think he is as meticulous in his inspections of the logistics systems as he is in his inquiries about the health of the occasional Adepta Sororitas aboard the ship!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

I think he is as meticulous in his inspections of the logistics systems as he is in his enquiries about the health of the occasional {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} aboard the ship!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “在上一次旅途中，韦尔森总领给我留下了深刻的印象。他当时来过好几次，询问我的健康状况。他是位可敬的人，也是{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的忠实仆人。他细致地询问了偶然登船的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}战斗修女{/g}的健康状况。我相信，他在检查后勤系统的状况时，肯定也会采取同样细致的态度！”
languages.original_text: "During the last journey, Seneschal Werserian stood out for me — he came by several times to ask about my health. He's an honourable man and a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I think he is as meticulous in his inspections of the logistics systems as he is in his enquiries about the health of the occasional {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} aboard the ship!"

traits.locale_text: “在上一次旅途中，韦尔森总领给我留下了深刻的印象。他当时来过好几次，询问我的健康状况。他是位可敬的人，也是{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的忠实仆人。他细致地询问了偶然登船的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}战斗修女{/g}的健康状况。我相信，他在检查后勤系统的状况时，肯定也会采取同样细致的态度！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "During the last journey, Seneschal Werserian stood out for me — he came by several times to ask about my health. He's an honourable man and a loyal servant of the Imperium. I think he is as meticulous in his inspections of the logistics systems as he is in his enquiries about the health of the occasional Sister of Battle aboard the ship!"

languages.text: «Durante el último viaje, el Senescal Werserian destacó especialmente. Vino varias veces para interesarse por mi salud. Es un hombre honorable y un fiel sirviente del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. ¡Creo que es tan meticuloso en sus inspecciones de logística como en su interés por la salud de una {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Hermana de Batalla{/g} en la nave!».
languages.original_text: "During the last journey, Seneschal Werserian stood out for me — he came by several times to ask about my health. He's an honourable man and a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I think he is as meticulous in his inspections of the logistics systems as he is in his enquiries about the health of the occasional {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} aboard the ship!"

traits.locale_text: «Durante el último viaje, el Senescal Werserian destacó especialmente. Vino varias veces para interesarse por mi salud. Es un hombre honorable y un fiel sirviente del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. ¡Creo que es tan meticuloso en sus inspecciones de logística como en su interés por la salud de una {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Hermana de Batalla{/g} en la nave!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「この前の旅では、ウェルザリアン家令長のことをよく覚えている。彼は何度も私の健康状態を尋ねにきたのだ。誉れある人物で、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の忠実なしもべだ。偶然にも乗り合わせた{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}バトルシスター{/g}の健康状態を尋ねるのと同じくらい、彼はロジスティクスシステムの点検に細心の注意を払っているだろう」
languages.original_text: "During the last journey, Seneschal Werserian stood out for me — he came by several times to ask about my health. He's an honourable man and a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I think he is as meticulous in his inspections of the logistics systems as he is in his enquiries about the health of the occasional {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} aboard the ship!"

traits.locale_text: 「この前の旅では、ウェルザリアン家令長のことをよく覚えている。彼は何度も私の健康状態を尋ねにきたのだ。誉れある人物で、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の忠実なしもべだ。偶然にも乗り合わせた{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}バトルシスター{/g}の健康状態を尋ねるのと同じくらい、彼はロジスティクスシステムの点検に細心の注意を払っているだろう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Während der letzten Reise ragte Truchsess Werserian heraus — er kam mehrfach zu mir, um sich nach meinem Zustand zu erkundigen. Er ist ein ehrenhafter Mann und ein treuer Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Er ist wohl ebenso gewissenhaft bei seinen Inspektionen der Logistiksysteme wie bei seinen Nachfragen die Gesundheit der seltenen {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Schwestern der Schlacht{/g} betreffend, die sich an Bord des Schiffs verirren!"
languages.original_text: "During the last journey, Seneschal Werserian stood out for me — he came by several times to ask about my health. He's an honourable man and a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I think he is as meticulous in his inspections of the logistics systems as he is in his enquiries about the health of the occasional {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} aboard the ship!"

traits.locale_text: "Während der letzten Reise ragte Truchsess Werserian heraus — er kam mehrfach zu mir, um sich nach meinem Zustand zu erkundigen. Er ist ein ehrenhafter Mann und ein treuer Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Er ist wohl ebenso gewissenhaft bei seinen Inspektionen der Logistiksysteme wie bei seinen Nachfragen die Gesundheit der seltenen {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Schwestern der Schlacht{/g} betreffend, die sich an Bord des Schiffs verirren!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Lors du dernier voyage, le sénéchal Werserian s'est montré très prévenant. Il est venu plusieurs fois s'enquérir de ma santé. C'est un homme d'honneur, doublé d'un loyal serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Je le pense tout aussi consciencieux dans ses inspections des systèmes logistiques que lorsqu'il s'inquiète de la santé d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sœur de Bataille{/g} quelconque à bord du vaisseau ! »
languages.original_text: "During the last journey, Seneschal Werserian stood out for me — he came by several times to ask about my health. He's an honourable man and a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I think he is as meticulous in his inspections of the logistics systems as he is in his enquiries about the health of the occasional {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} aboard the ship!"

traits.locale_text: « Lors du dernier voyage, le sénéchal Werserian s'est montré très prévenant. Il est venu plusieurs fois s'enquérir de ma santé. C'est un homme d'honneur, doublé d'un loyal serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Je le pense tout aussi consciencieux dans ses inspections des systèmes logistiques que lorsqu'il s'inquiète de la santé d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sœur de Bataille{/g} quelconque à bord du vaisseau ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Son seyahatimde Seneşal Werserian dikkatimi çekti. Durumumu sormak için birkaç kez yanıma geldi. Kendisi, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'a{/g} sadakatle hizmet eden onurlu bir adam. Lojistik sistemlerini teftiş ederken gösterdiği hassasiyeti, gemisine rastlayan {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Harp Rahibeleri'ne{/g} hâl hatır sorarken de gösterdiği aşikâr!"
languages.original_text: "During the last journey, Seneschal Werserian stood out for me — he came by several times to ask about my health. He's an honourable man and a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I think he is as meticulous in his inspections of the logistics systems as he is in his enquiries about the health of the occasional {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} aboard the ship!"

traits.locale_text: "Son seyahatimde Seneşal Werserian dikkatimi çekti. Durumumu sormak için birkaç kez yanıma gelmişti. Kendisi, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'a sadakatle hizmet eden onurlu bir adam. Lojistik sistemlerini teftiş ederken gösterdiği hassasiyeti, gemisine rastlayan {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Harp Rahibeleri{/g}ne hâl hatır sorarken de gösterdiği aşikâr!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
